DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effects Green Coffee Bean Extract ( GCE ) Physiological Psychological Variables
DOC.detailed_description: Coffee one favorite worldwide beverage comprise variety chemical maintain great health benefit among commonly consume beverage . Most investigation far focus beneficial effect caffeine . On contrary , knowledge potential health benefit non-caffeine coffee compound scarce . Coffee contain many polyphenols , especially chlorogenic acid ( CGA ) , purport antioxidant ability . With increase incidence degenerative disease , general public turning use natural herbal supplement , one agent , CGA biologically medically emphasize expect become topic addressed future study , medical trend pharmacology . The reduce risk variety disease follow CGA consumption mention recent basic clinical study . However , lack study examine behavioral effect CGA . This study aim fill gap . In randomized double-blind study , investigator test acute effect coffee enrich CGA CGA supplement physiological function blood pressure , blood glucose , heart rate , psychological function mood cognitive performance 30 healthy adult subject ( 18-40 year ) . Participants allocate intervention plan use computer-generated random number . Treatments comprise ( 1 ) 6g decaffeinate ( 5 mg caffeine ) coffee ( 250 ml ) high total CGA ( 560 mg ) , ( 2 ) 6g decaffeinate coffee ( 250 ml ) normal total CGA ( 224 mg ) , ( 3 ) 6g decaffeinate coffee ( 250 ml ) normal total CGA 800mg green coffee bean extract total CGA ( 560mg ) , ( 4 ) 6g decaffeinate coffee ( 250 ml ) normal total CGA placebo , ( 5 ) treatment group . Participants instruct abstain alcohol , food , beverage contain caffeine , chlorogenic acid high polyphenol content 24 hour prior experiment . Upon arrival laboratory , participant complete 24-hour food recall , psychometric test battery consist questionnaire competence control belief ( FKK ) , Life Orientation Test-Revised ( LOT-R ) , Beliefs Medicines Questionnaire ( BMQ ) , Sensitivity Punishment Reward Questionnaire ( SPSRQ ) , General Self-Efficacy ( SWE ) questionnaire , mood cognitive performance test consist Profile Mood States ( POMS ) questionnaire , parametric Go/no-Go test ( PGNG ) California Verbal Learning Test ( CVLT ) . The POMS , Go/no-Go , CVLT repeat 40 min follow CGA application , coincide approximate peak CGA blood concentration 120 min post treatment . Blood pressure , blood glucose heart rate recording take prior treatment 1 , 30 , 60 , 90 120 min post-treatment . The response GCE-enriched coffee compare GCE supplement group variable .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 18 40 year old Normal weight ( BMI > 18 < 25 kg/m2 ) Regular coffee drinker ( 1 2 cups/day ) Both male female BMI < 18 > 25 kg/m2 Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) < 100 > 160 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) < 50 > 100 mmHg History neurological , psychiatric , cardiac , endocrine disorder History substance abuse Current use antihypertensive psychotropic medication More 30 g/day alcohol consumption Woman pregnant lactating
